updates.message: We are investigating reports of slow database queries affecting multiple services.
Issue identified: High memory usage on primary database server due to inefficient query patterns. Team is working on optimization.
Query optimizations have been deployed. Monitoring database performance closely.
Database performance has returned to normal levels. All services are operating normally.
We are aware of intermittent authentication failures affecting a small subset of users.
Root cause identified as rate limiting configuration issue. Deploying fix.
Fix has been deployed. Monitoring authentication success rates closely.
